wikipedia_page.main: Robert Lee Gardner (born 11 July 1970) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Aberdeen, Oxford United, Ayr United, Meadowbank Thistle, Arbroath, Albion Rovers, Clydebank, Alloa, Brechin, Airdrieonians and Airdrie United.

response: Terrence Lee Gardner (born  January 16, 1975) is an American former Major League Baseball pitcher. In , Gardner made his Major League Baseball debut with the Tampa Bay Devil Rays; he also played five games with the Devil Rays in . Gardner spent the  season with the Toledo Mud Hens, the Triple-A affiliate of the Detroit Tigers. He split the  season between the Triple-A Albuquerque Isotopes and the Marlins. Gardner pitched in 62 games with the Marlins in 2007, going 3–4 with a 1.94 ERA. He retired after the  season.
*Lee Gardner at Pura Pelota (Venezuelan Professional Baseball League)
